newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary Jan-Oct budget deficit 75.5 bln forints.
newsitem.headline: Hungary Jan-Oct budget deficit 75.5 bln forints.

text.p: Hungary's central budget deficit in the January-October period was an accumulated 75.5 billion forints, down from 114.8 billion forints in the January-September period, the Finance Ministry said on Tuesday.
The budget had a 39 billion forints surplus in October, it said.
Accumulated revenues in the January-October period amounted to 1,603.9 billion forints, while expenditures stood at 1,679.4 billion forints, the ministry said.
The figures do not include privatisation and one-off revenues.
Hungary's 1996 central budget deficit ceiling is 232.9 billion forints, not including privatisation and one-off revenues.
